Articles.Content:
Hi PRO modders,

I wanted a mod for KSP which shows a glideslope that a spaceplane can follow to land on a runway. I know that planes in real life use it too. This way, you won't need to use Mechjeb to land gracefully.

No need to request it, it already exists: NavUtilities. Among other features, you can change the glideslope and switch runways.

You may also want to check out the Community Mods & Plugins Library.
